summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 8814, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from the South line of H. C. Pettit's Addition, to East Lynn Street, by grading the same, under Majority Petition, being Clerk's File number 16668, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said City, approved December 6, 1899.
